task.title: Schedule a test suite collection execution

taskbody.context: After you have installed the Test Suite Collection Scheduler plugin, you can now schedule your test suite collection in . Do as follows:

step.cmd: Input the time that you want to schedule for the next run.

step.stepresult:
A new test run is scheduled. The Next run field contains the date of the upcoming execution of this test suite collection.
You need to keep Katalon Studio open until the time you scheduled.
success message

step.cmd: Optional: To reschedule, input a new time and click Schedule again.
step.stepresult:
You can only schedule one test run at a time, so the new time overrides the previous one that you scheduled.
info message

taskbody.result:
When the schedule time comes, Katalon Studio automatically triggers the test run. You can see the detailed information of this schedule event in the Event Log.
event log
